name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Ephraim;You mentioned a dancer who came through here?

speak;Man2;Oh yes!|What a performer she was!|Her dances were like magic, I tell you.|After watching her, I felt like I could work twice as hard without getting tired.|It was the strangest thing.|My aches and pains just melted away!
speak;Ephraim;That does sound remarkable.|Do you remember anything else about her?

speak;Man2;She had this presence about her, you know?|Graceful, but there was something...mystical about it.|I've never seen anyone dance quite like that before.|I sure hope she passes through again someday.|These old bones could use another one of her performances!
speak;Ephraim;Perhaps your paths will cross again. Thank you for sharing.
